citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care.
citations.narrative:
Four bottles of injectable Heparin were found with an expiration date of October 2020. Expired medication can lose
potency, and may adversely affect the animals. The facility must ensure that all medications are within date and properly
stored.
********Correct by August 13, 2021
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
2.33(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care. 
Four bottles of injectable Heparin were found with an expiration date of October 2020. Expired medication can lose 
potency, and may adversely affect the animals. The facility must ensure that all medications are within date and properly 
stored. 
********Correct by August 13, 2021 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
End Section
